job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: ltpgtltstronggtJob Description ltstronggtltpgtltpgtOrchestrade is looking for a software engineer with strong technical skills to join our development team The Orchestrade development team continually extends our leading trading risk and operations solution to cover new business cases new financial products new analytics as well as meeting the challenges of the continuous evolution of capital markets for sellside toptier banks and buyside hedge funds and asset managersltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtJob Site ltstronggtltpgtltpgt San Mateo CalifornialtpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtResponsibilities ltstronggtltpgtltpgt Contribute to the design of new servicesltpgtltpgt Develop software that is highperformance scalable and robustltpgtltpgt Work closely with the Product team to define and understand enduser requirements and translate them into pragmatic technical solutionsltpgtltpgt Contribute to and improve our engineering standards tooling and processesltpgtltpgt Participate in developing automated tests coverageltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtMinimum Requirements ltstronggtltpgtltpgt BSMS degree in Computer Science or other related fieldsltpgtltpgt Ability to solve complex issues and strong analytical skillsltpgtltpgt Experience with objectoriented programming languages C is a plusltpgtltpgt Ability to work well with remote teamsltpgtltpgt Proficient in Englishltpgtltpgt Positive attitude and mindsetltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtWhy Choose Orchestrade ltstronggtltpgtltpgt Work with latest technologies and worldwide biggest financial institutionsltpgtltpgt International teamltpgtltpgt Passion to see what is under the hood and master the frameworks usedltpgtltpgt Dedicated time to continuous learningltpgtltpgt Eager to improve your knowledge on financial markets and on the latest technologiesltpgt
